title: Ticket #2597: Brain dump of Nick LeRoy
description:
Nick (nleroy) is departing the Center for High Throughput Computing after many years. While lately much of his work has been w/ the infrastructure and BaTLab groups, there is Condor development info in his head we want captured before his departure.

Below is a priority sorted list of Nick Brain Dump(TM) items. Each item includes who will become the new owner of the area previously owned by Nick. Nick (the dumper) and the new owner (the dumpee) need to meet for the suggested amount of time below. The dumpee will be responsible for taking notes and writing up a wiki page synopsis for each item (add a link here) that Nick will then review for completeness and accuracy.

  1. Mirroring / download scripts. ~2hrs. psilord. Wed 2:30
  2. Hawkeye implementation details and/or concerns, incl old -vs- new implementation. ~2hrs. gthain. Dumped
  3. Condor power tool, wake on LAN code. ~1hr. adesmet. Dumped
  4. HAD. ~2hr. tlmiller. Dumped
  5. The param "branding" code (aka hide the name Condor, call it something else like Hawkeye). 1hr. psilord. Brain Dumped, waiting for writeup to review
  6. Lotman. 2hr. zmiller Thurs 1:00
  7. Lease Manager. ~2hrs. jfrey. Brain Dumped, waiting for writeup to review
  8. Pool Tools. 1hr. adesmet. Dumped
